title: Easy Peach-Raspberry Dessert Topping
directions: Serve over your favorite angel food, pound or cheese cake. Fill plain or chocolate pastry cups. Pour sauce into a squeeze bottle to swirl on dessert plates or over desserts for an elegant presentation.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) jar Dickinson's Pure Elberta Peach Preserves
